## Restock Recommendation

|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 40,000                                   |

| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 10,000 units less than the player's planned order size. |

This also aligns with the current stock level, minimizing the risk of excess inventory. |
